title: PVP.net kernel has stopped working, RADS error wont let me start the game client

replies.body:
Hi I had this issue and the red who replied is probably wrong.

Try:

1) Resetting your router

Or if that doesn't work:

2) Connect to a different WiFi, patch your game, then connect back to your normal internet.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/czvzZ1Y8-patcher-not-working-rads-error-cannot-connect-to-http-server

It sounds like some setting in your OS has changed, and is blocking the client from launching.  Check out the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide and go over each step to get access restored.  Hope that helps!
